historical_summary: Xavier has been actively trading cryptocurrencies, particularly $XVI, and has shown interest in blockchain technology by attending meetups and webinars.
He has started to use AI coding assistants to streamline his development projects, focusing on creating dApps on Solana.
Xavier has been exploring the dating scene, using apps and attending social events to meet new people.
He has expressed interest in the intersection of technology and personal life, often discussing how AI might shape future relationships.
Regular video calls with his family where he shares his tech adventures, particularly his involvement with $XVI.
Xavier has been building his first professional network through tech meetups, online forums, and social media.
Xavier has been contemplating the rapid advancements in AI and blockchain, particularly how these technologies could revolutionize various industries.
Xavier's interest in $XVI has grown as he observes its mysterious link to his life events and its potential in the Solana ecosystem.
